entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
